headline: Vulcan Declares Quarterly Dividend on Common Stock
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. - The Board of Directors of Vulcan Materials Company today declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.49 per share on its common stock. The dividend will be payable on September 3,...
